revision.text:
<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasCreationDate
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Attribute for specifying the creation date of a media file.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has type::Date| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasFilename
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Used to specify a file name for a media file. The file name will be used as page title for the uploaded file.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[has type::Type:String| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasRelatedArticle
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Used to attach a wiki article with an uploaded media file.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Is inverse of::Property:Attachment| ]]
[[Has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasUploadDate
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Denotes the date at which a media file was uploaded. The property value is automatically determined by the system upon uploading.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has type::Type:Date| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasUploader
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Relates a media file with the person who uploaded the file (e.g. User:WikiSysop).
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has type::Type:Page| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media;Category:Person| ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasCopyrightBy
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Relates a media file with its copyright owner (e.g. a wiki-user).
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has type::Type:Page| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media;Category:Person| ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasDescription
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Used for giving a textual description of a media file (see Category:Media).
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has type::Type:Text| ]] [[Subproperty of::Property:Description| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Subsection of |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Teamwork section, |rationale=Allows attaching content to other content (e.g. projects, tasks, events and persons) in a hierarchical manner. |long description=__NOTITLE__ Denotes a content item as subsection of another content item. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[Is inverse of::Property:HasSubsection| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Content; Category:Content| ]] [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[Category:Transitive properties]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasKeywords
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Keywords associated with this file.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[has type::Type:String| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:HasFormat
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Displays the format of this file as it's MIME type.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[has type::Type:String| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Media; | ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Has author |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Specifies the author of a particular wiki section or a wiki article in general (i.e. content). |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[Has domain and range::; Category:Person| ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:Part of
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Relates a wiki part to its superordinate wiki part (e.g. a content section). E.g. part of(Property:Narrower term, Terminology management section).
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has type::Type:Page| ]] 

[[Is inverse of::Property:Has part| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Wiki_part; Category:Wiki_part| ]] 

[[Category:Transitive properties]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:Rationale
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Used to provide a (short) explanation or description of a wiki part.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has max cardinality::1| ]] 
[[Has min cardinality::1| ]] 
[[Has domain and range::Category:Wiki_part| ]]
[[Has type::Type:Text| ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Property
|PAGENAME=Property:Calls template
|Has author=WikiSysop
|rationale=Relates a wiki-part (e.g. a template or form) to a template which is being called from within the wiki-part.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Has type::Type:Page| ]]
[[Is inverse of::Property:Is called by template or form| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Template; Category:Template| ]]
[[has domain and range::Category:Form; Category:Template| ]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category
|PAGENAME=Category:Media
|Has author=User:WikiSysop
|part of=Teamwork section
|Has default form=Form:RMUpload
|rationale=This category subsumes media content coming from media files (e.g. document, audio, image and video files).
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Category:Content|Content]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category
|PAGENAME=Category:Image
|Has author=User:WikiSysop2
|part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section
|Has default form=Form:RMImage
|rationale=Denotes all images.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Category:Media|Image]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category
|PAGENAME=Category:Pdf
|Has author=User:WikiSysop2
|part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section
|Has default form=Form:RMPdf
|rationale=Contains all PDF documents.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Category:Media|Media]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category
|PAGENAME=Category:Document
|Has author=User:WikiSysop
|part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section
|Has default form=Form:RMDocument
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Category:Media|Document]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category
|PAGENAME=Category:Audio
|Has author=User:WikiSysop2
|Has default form=Form:RMAudio
|part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section]]
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Category:Media|Media]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category |rationale=Denotes videos |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Has default form=Form:RMVideo }} [[Category:Media]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category |rationale=Denotes vcards |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Has default form=Form:RMVCard }} [[Category:Media]]

<noinclude>{{RM Bundle}}</noinclude>{{Category
|PAGENAME=Category:ICalendar
|Has author=User:WikiSysop2
|part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section
|Has default form=Form:RMICalendar
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
}}
[[Category:Media|ICalendar]]

revision.comment: Created page with "Ontology version: [[Ontology version::150]] Install dir: [[Installation dir::extensions/RichMedia]] vendor: [[Vendor::Ontoprise]] desc: [[Description::Store richmedia files in ou..."
revision.text: Ontology version: [[Ontology version::150]] Install dir: [[Installation dir::extensions/RichMedia]] vendor: [[Vendor::Ontoprise]] desc: [[Description::Store richmedia files in our your wiki.]] {{RM Bundle}}

<noinclude>{{Bundle}}</noinclude>|<noinclude> {{documentation}} <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls. </noinclude>

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Category |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a category. |long description=__NOTITLE__ You should use this template to provide your wiki-community with a proper documentation of the categories used in the wiki. |Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Category |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_category_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === This category is populated by the form: {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Page has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}}|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} }}[[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Category| ]] === Defined in templates === This category is used for category annotations in the templates: {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new template using this category by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateTemplate?category={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create template])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining template|link=none}}
}} {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|[[Category:Wiki part| ]]|}}[[Is category::true| ]]

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Copyright of article |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Displays a box for an article containing copy right info. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Copyright of article
|own work=
|year=
|copyright holder=
|url=
|title=
|date retrieved=
}}
|hints for templates and forms=Set "own work" to "True" if you have the copyright of the article, false otherwise. |Calls template=Template:GNU Free Documentation License,Template:Cite web in help }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 |date retrieved=2009/03/29 }} {{#ifeq:{{{own work|}}}|True|{{GNU Free Documentation License |year={{{year|}}} |copyright holder={{{copyright holder|}}} }} |{{Cite web in help |url={{{url|}}} |title={{{title|}}} |retrieved={{{date retrieved|}}} |publisher={{{copyright holder|}}} }} }}

{{Bundle}}
;Copyright © {{{year}}} {{{copyright holder}}}.
Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.2 or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation; with no Invariant Sections, no Front-Cover Texts, and no Back-Cover Texts. A copy of the license is included in the article "[[GNU_Free_Documentation_License|GNU Free Documentation License]]". 
{{
GNU Free Documentation License
|year=
|copyright holder=
}}

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|hints for templates and forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Template ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Short description|}}}|| {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=}} | {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Form=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Semantic form ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value=''main namespace''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value={{{Has special namespace|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value={{{Example article|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Category=

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Property |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Displays a property and some essential metadata. |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Property |Icon=Image:smw_plus_property_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === New pages (i.e. "redlinks") which are related via this property shall use the form: *{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} [[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Property| ]] [[Category:Property]]
Bundle: [[Part of bundle::Richmedia]]

<noinclude>{{Bundle}}</noinclude>|<noinclude> {{documentation}} <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls. </noinclude>

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Category |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a category. |long description=__NOTITLE__ You should use this template to provide your wiki-community with a proper documentation of the categories used in the wiki. |Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Category |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_category_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === This category is populated by the form: {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Page has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}}|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} }}[[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Category| ]] === Defined in templates === This category is used for category annotations in the templates: {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new template using this category by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateTemplate?category={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create template])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining template|link=none}}
}} {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|[[Category:Wiki part| ]]|}}[[Is category::true| ]]

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Copyright of article |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Displays a box for an article containing copy right info. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Copyright of article
|own work=
|year=
|copyright holder=
|url=
|title=
|date retrieved=
}}
|hints for templates and forms=Set "own work" to "True" if you have the copyright of the article, false otherwise. |Calls template=Template:GNU Free Documentation License,Template:Cite web in help }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 |date retrieved=2009/03/29 }} {{#ifeq:{{{own work|}}}|True|{{GNU Free Documentation License |year={{{year|}}} |copyright holder={{{copyright holder|}}} }} |{{Cite web in help |url={{{url|}}} |title={{{title|}}} |retrieved={{{date retrieved|}}} |publisher={{{copyright holder|}}} }} }}

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|hints for templates and forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Template ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Short description|}}}|| {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=}} | {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Form=

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Bundle}}{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}
